feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP Development
feed.subtitle: ABAP Development Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How to manage variables in Task from a WorkFlow?
entry.content:
Hello,

I have a requirement where I have to put some variables like Custommer number, Material text,... into a email sent from a Task in a Workflow. All is standard. The point is that this variables are not available in the container of the task and I already have tried to make a small ABAP script in the text editor with Command line, but looks that doesn't work this ABAP. 

Any ideas about how to proceed there?

entry.title: SAP Window always appearing in Eclipse
entry.content:
Hi,
I installed & configured Eclipse IDE Version: 2025-06 (4.36.0) with SAP GUI 7.0
Whenever i try to create a new table in Eclipse editor, its opening the SAP ABAP window in eclipse (SE11) instead of creating in the eclipse with Java script itself.

Am i missing any config ?

entry.title: Skip step in flexible PO workflow
entry.content:
Hello Everyone,

We have a requirement to implement Flexible PO approval process. We have a bespoke table with three levels of approval. Therefore, we have written logic in BADI-MMPUR_WORKFLOW_AGENTS_V2 for agent determination. The approval rationale is like below.
Variance  -  difference between the standard price of the material and the item's net price.

If the difference is between 30% and 50%, go to approver 1.
If there is a difference between 50% and 90%, go to approvers 1 and 2.
If GT 90%, go to approvers 1 + 2 + 3.

Three-level approvals are predefined in the Manage Workflows in Purchase Orders steps.

 

We have a scenario where variance is falling between 30-50 which means we will have only 1 level approval.  So when control goes to level 2 , the approvers table will be empty and as agent determination is mandatory the system throws an exception. Ideally when condition is satisfied rest of the steps need to be skipped ( level 2 and 3 in this case ).

Currently we have a condition at workflow level as we need automatic approval if the variance is less than 30%.

Since BADI only allows for one condition ID (SWF_WORKFLOW_CONDITION_DEF), we are unable to add another condition for step-level control.

We are at a standstill and unable to proceed, went through relevant blogs but was unable to find anything.
Has anyone worked on a requirement like this before?

Please let me  if any information is needed further.

Thank you

Regards,

Karthik

entry.title: Sap_payslip_de_o Hrforms payslip custom/copied infostar sign conversion
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

I am working on Germany SAP payslip i.e sap_payslip_de_o in Hrforms

For custom changes i had copied the payslip in z* form.

For convenience i had copied some standard infonets then copied some stardard infostars to differentiate the wagetypes.

But if i am maintaining the wagetype in the infostar provided by SAP i am getting correct sign expected,

But if i am copying the same sap infostar and maintaining the wagetype there i am not getting correct sign expected.

 

Where should i need to maintain the sign conversion rule for that and ,please let me know the path.

Thanks in advance 

HCM Payroll #hcm germany #hr abap ABAP Development #hcm payslip

entry.title: create custom tab with Custom Controller in Business Partner in General data
entry.content:
hi Team,

I was following the below blog to configure the tab and I am able to successfully do it.

https://community.sap.com/t5/enterprise-resource-planning-blog-posts-by-sap/sap-s-4hana-bp-screen-enhancement-with-custom-tab/ba-p/13442253

I am looking to add the Custom Controller as new tab in the Business Partner, it was leading to dump.  I debugged and reduced the height to 14 from default 27.

Now I see that the data is not populated, upon debugging I found that the table TBZ3A_TD contains screens 7001 which is preventing the data to be populated.

Could you please help how to get the screens allocated to 1001 series or 5000 series

entry.title: My sales order VA01 transaction timed out
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

My VA01 transaction timed out after pressing the SAVE button.

The ST22 log showed that the program MV45AFZA was triggered and the corresponding subroutine
USEREXIT_REFRESH_DOCUMENT caused it.

Below is the code snippet of the endless loop.

DO.
SELECT SINGLE * FROM vbak
WHERE vbeln = d_bapiso.
IF sy-subrc = 0.
clear vbak.
EXIT.
ENDIF.
ENDDO.

What is your proposed solution and what do you think is the rootcause?

Thanks,

New cloud guy

entry.title: Dynamic Mass Upload Report on Month & Year
entry.content:
We need to develop a program to upload the daily dispatch plan. in input screen user will enter the month & Year and execute we should get an excel template downloaded with columns Matnr , Plant and followed by columns of day - month. upload function we will fill those details and upload will be saved to custom table and we need to give runtime save in alv(editable).

Here we can see Mode code and plant as primary key and date and value in respective column should be updated in table where value associated with that date.

Example in table one record will be :

A010 ,  1810910 , 100 , 20250701. this should be inserted in that table and such 31 records will be inserted in custom table from this shown data. 

Input:

Year :2025

Month : 7 / July.

Example :

PlantMatnr1-Jul2-Jul3-Jul4-Jul5-Jul6-Jul7-Jul8-Jul9-Jul10-Jul11-Jul12-Jul13-Jul14-Jul15-Jul16-Jul17-Jul18-Jul19-Jul20-Jul21-Jul22-Jul23-Jul24-Jul25-Jul26-Jul27-Jul28-Jul29-Jul30-Jul
A01018109101002003004005006007008009001000110012001300140015001600              

Here is how I approach:

  • First, I have created a header table with all columns that i need on inputs.
  • Then Created data table using field cat and field symbol.
  • Using this two i have implemented download excel template functionality.
  • After that Handle upload excel data into internal table.
  • ALV DISPLAY Editable and Save Functionality.
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Report ZZTEST_DOWNLOAD_UPLOAD_DISP
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*&
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
REPORT zztest_download_upload_disp.


TABLES: sscrfields.

DATA: lv_day        TYPE t009b-butag,
      lt_data       TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF string,
      lv_filename   TYPE string,
      lv_path       TYPE string,
      lv_fullpath   TYPE string,
      lv_title      TYPE string,
      lv_last_day   TYPE datum,
      lt_fcat       TYPE lvc_t_fcat,
      ls_fcat       TYPE lvc_s_fcat,
      lref_data     TYPE REF TO data,
      lref_table    TYPE REF TO data,
      lv_year       TYPE i VALUE 2025,
      lv_month      TYPE i VALUE 8,
      lv_first_date TYPE d,
      lv_last_date  TYPE d,
      lv_current    TYPE d,
      lt_dates      TYPE TABLE OF d.

FIELD-SYMBOLS:<fs_table>          TYPE STANDARD TABLE,
              <fs_table_copy>     TYPE STANDARD TABLE,
              <fs_table_copy_ref> TYPE STANDARD TABLE,
              <fs_line>           TYPE any,
              <fs_value1>         TYPE any,
              <fs_value2>         TYPE any,
              <fs_field>          TYPE any,
              <fs_input>          TYPE any,
              <fs_input1>         TYPE any,
              <fs_value>          TYPE any,
              <fs_value_1>        TYPE any,
              <fs_month>          TYPE any.

TYPES: BEGIN OF tp_heading,
         heading(30),
       END OF tp_heading.

DATA: gt_heading             TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF tp_heading,
      gs_heading             TYPE tp_heading,
      gt_fieldcat            TYPE TABLE OF slis_fieldcat_alv,
      gs_fieldcat            TYPE slis_fieldcat_alv,
      lv_date                TYPE string,
      lv_loop                TYPE i,
      index                  TYPE i,
      lv_new_date            TYPE string,
      lv_index               TYPE sy-tabix,
      lv_cell                TYPE string,
      lv_field               TYPE char5,
      gv_filename            TYPE string,
      gv_path                TYPE string,
      gv_fullpath            TYPE string,
      gv_result              TYPE i,
      gv_template_downloaded TYPE abap_bool VALUE abap_false,
      it_raw                 TYPE truxs_t_text_data,
      gv_year                TYPE char4.
DATA : gs_disp_plan TYPE zzmm_d_disp_plan.
DATA: lt_columns TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF string.

SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK b1 WITH FRAME TITLE TEXT-001.
  PARAMETERS: rb_down RADIOBUTTON GROUP grp DEFAULT 'X' USER-COMMAND rb-s1,
              rb_up   RADIOBUTTON GROUP grp.
SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK b1.

SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK b2 WITH FRAME TITLE TEXT-002.
  PARAMETERS: p_month TYPE t009b-bumon MODIF ID sc1 OBLIGATORY,
              p_year  TYPE t009b-bdatj MODIF ID sc1 OBLIGATORY.
SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK b2.
SELECTION-SCREEN BEGIN OF BLOCK b3 WITH FRAME TITLE TEXT-002.
  PARAMETERS: s_file TYPE rlgrap-filename MODIF ID sc2 OBLIGATORY.
SELECTION-SCREEN END OF BLOCK b3.


AT SELECTION-SCREEN OUTPUT.
  IF rb_down = 'X'.
    LOOP AT SCREEN.
      IF screen-group1 = 'SC2'.
        screen-invisible = 1.
        screen-input = 0.
        MODIFY SCREEN.
*      ELSEIF screen-group1 = 'SC1'.
*        screen-invisible = 0.
*        screen-input = 1.
*        MODIFY SCREEN.
      ENDIF.
    ENDLOOP.
  ELSE.
    LOOP AT SCREEN.
      IF screen-group1 = 'SC2'.
        screen-invisible = 0.
        screen-input = 1.
        MODIFY SCREEN.
*      ELSEIF screen-group1 = 'SC1'.
*        screen-invisible = 1.
*        screen-input = 0.
*        MODIFY SCREEN.
      ENDIF.
    ENDLOOP.
  ENDIF.

AT SELECTION-SCREEN ON VALUE-REQUEST FOR s_file.
  CALL FUNCTION 'F4_FILENAME'
    EXPORTING
      field_name   = 'S_FILE'
      program_name = sy-cprog
    IMPORTING
      file_name    = s_file.


START-OF-SELECTION.

  CALL FUNCTION 'NUMBER_OF_DAYS_PER_MONTH_GET'
    EXPORTING
      par_month = p_month
      par_year  = p_year
    IMPORTING
      par_days  = lv_day.

  IF rb_down = 'X'.
    PERFORM build_headings.
    PERFORM get_save_location.
    PERFORM create_table.
    PERFORM download_template.
  ELSE.
    PERFORM build_headings.
    PERFORM create_table.
    PERFORM upload_data.
  ENDIF.
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Form build_headings
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& -->  p1        text
*& <--  p2        text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM build_headings .
  gs_heading-heading = 'Plant'.
  APPEND gs_heading TO gt_heading.
  CLEAR gs_heading.

  gs_heading-heading = 'Model name'.
  APPEND gs_heading TO gt_heading.
  CLEAR gs_heading.

  SELECT SINGLE ktx
     FROM t247
     INTO (month_name)
    WHERE mnr   = @p_month.
  DATA : index   TYPE i,
         index_1 TYPE p.
  index = 1.
  index_1 = 1.
  WHILE  index <= lv_day.
    DATA(lv_header) = |{ index } - { month_name } |.
    gs_heading-heading = lv_header.
    APPEND gs_heading TO gt_heading.
    index = index + 1.
    index_1 = index_1 + 1.
    CLEAR gs_heading.
  ENDWHILE.

  IF sy-subrc = 0.
  ENDIF.
ENDFORM.
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Form table
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& -->  p1        text
*& <--  p2        text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM create_table.


* Define number of columns dynamically
  DATA(lv_num_columns) = lv_day + 2. " Example: 5 columns

* Build the field catalog
  DO lv_num_columns TIMES.
    DATA(lv_column_name) = |COL{ sy-index }|.
    ls_fcat-fieldname = lv_column_name.
    ls_fcat-datatype  = 'CHAR'.
    ls_fcat-intlen    = 50.
    APPEND ls_fcat TO lt_fcat.
  ENDDO.

  CALL METHOD cl_alv_table_create=>create_dynamic_table
    EXPORTING
      it_fieldcatalog = lt_fcat
    IMPORTING
      ep_table        = lref_table.

  ASSIGN lref_table->* TO <fs_table>.


  CREATE DATA lref_data LIKE LINE OF <fs_table>.
  ASSIGN lref_data->* TO <fs_line>.


ENDFORM.

FORM get_save_location.
  CONCATENATE 'Template_' sy-datum sy-uzeit INTO gv_filename.

  CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>file_save_dialog
    EXPORTING
      window_title      = 'Select the location'
      default_extension = 'xls'
      default_file_name = gv_filename
    CHANGING
      filename          = gv_filename
      path              = gv_path
      fullpath          = gv_fullpath
      user_action       = gv_result.
ENDFORM.

FORM download_template.
  IF gv_fullpath IS NOT INITIAL.
    CALL FUNCTION 'GUI_DOWNLOAD'
      EXPORTING
        filename   = gv_fullpath
        filetype   = 'DAT'
      TABLES
        data_tab   = <fs_table>
        fieldnames = gt_heading
      EXCEPTIONS
        OTHERS     = 22.

    IF sy-subrc = 0.
      gv_template_downloaded = abap_true.

      CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>execute
        EXPORTING
          document = gv_fullpath
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS   = 10.
    ENDIF.
  ENDIF.
ENDFORM.
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& Form upload_data
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
*& -->  p1        text
*& <--  p2        text
*&---------------------------------------------------------------------*
FORM upload_data .
  CALL FUNCTION 'TEXT_CONVERT_XLS_TO_SAP'
    EXPORTING
      i_tab_raw_data       = it_raw
      i_filename           = s_file
    TABLES
      i_tab_converted_data = <fs_table>
    EXCEPTIONS
      conversion_failed    = 1
      OTHERS               = 2.

  IF sy-subrc = 0.
    LOOP AT gt_heading INTO DATA(lv_fieldname).
      CLEAR: lv_field,gs_fieldcat.
      lv_field = |COL{ sy-tabix }|.
      gs_fieldcat-fieldname = lv_field."lv_fieldname.
      gs_fieldcat-seltext_l = lv_fieldname.
      gs_fieldcat-col_pos = sy-tabix.
      gs_fieldcat-ctabname = '<fs_table>'.
      gs_fieldcat-edit = 'X'.
      APPEND gs_fieldcat TO gt_fieldcat.
    ENDLOOP.
  ENDIF.

  lv_first_date = |{ p_year }{ p_month }01|.


  CALL FUNCTION 'RP_LAST_DAY_OF_MONTHS'
    EXPORTING
      day_in            = lv_first_date
    IMPORTING
      last_day_of_month = lv_last_date.


  lv_current = lv_first_date.
  WHILE lv_current <= lv_last_date.
    APPEND lv_current TO lt_dates.
    lv_current = lv_current + 1.
  ENDWHILE.

  lv_loop = lv_day.
  ASSIGN <fs_table> TO <fs_table_copy>.
  DELETE <fs_table> INDEX 1.

  EXPORT itab_content = <fs_table>[] TO MEMORY ID 'data'.

  LOOP AT <fs_table_copy> ASSIGNING <fs_input> FROM 2.
    ASSIGN COMPONENT 1 OF STRUCTURE <fs_input> TO <fs_value1>.
    ASSIGN COMPONENT 2 OF STRUCTURE <fs_input> TO <fs_value2>.
    index = 1.
    DO lv_loop TIMES.
      ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index + 2 OF STRUCTURE <fs_input> TO <fs_value>.
      READ TABLE lt_dates INDEX index INTO DATA(ls_date).
      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        CLEAR gs_disp_plan.
        gs_disp_plan-mcode = <fs_value1>.
        gs_disp_plan-mname = <fs_value2>.
        gs_disp_plan-zplan = <fs_value>.
        gs_disp_plan-zdate = ls_date.
        MODIFY zzmm_d_disp_plan FROM gs_disp_plan.
      ENDIF.
      index = index + 1.
    ENDDO.
  ENDLOOP.
  CALL FUNCTION 'REUSE_ALV_GRID_DISPLAY'
    EXPORTING
      i_callback_program       = sy-repid
      i_callback_pf_status_set = ' '
      i_callback_user_command  = 'SAVE'
      i_default                = 'X'
      i_save                   = 'S'
      it_fieldcat              = gt_fieldcat
    TABLES
      t_outtab                 = <fs_table>
    EXCEPTIONS
      program_error            = 1
      OTHERS                   = 2.


ENDFORM.

FORM save USING rcomm TYPE sy-ucomm
      sel TYPE slis_selfield.

  CASE sy-ucomm.
    WHEN '&DATA_SAVE'.

      lv_loop = lv_day.

      CALL METHOD cl_alv_table_create=>create_dynamic_table
        EXPORTING
          it_fieldcatalog = lt_fcat
        IMPORTING
          ep_table        = lref_data.

        ASSIGN lref_data->* TO <fs_table_copy_ref>.

        CREATE DATA lref_data LIKE LINE OF <fs_table_copy_ref>.
        IMPORT itab_content = <fs_table_copy_ref> FROM MEMORY ID 'data'.

      LOOP AT <fs_table> ASSIGNING <fs_input>.
        ASSIGN COMPONENT 1 OF STRUCTURE <fs_input> TO <fs_value1>.
        ASSIGN COMPONENT 2 OF STRUCTURE <fs_input> TO <fs_value2>.
        READ TABLE <fs_table_copy_ref> ASSIGNING <fs_input1> INDEX sy-tabix.
        index = 1.
        IF <fs_input> NE <fs_input1>.
          DO lv_loop TIMES.
            ASSIGN COMPONENT sy-index + 2 OF STRUCTURE <fs_input> TO <fs_value>.
            READ TABLE lt_dates INDEX index INTO DATA(ls_date).
            IF sy-subrc = 0.
              CLEAR gs_disp_plan.
              gs_disp_plan-mcode = <fs_value1>.
              gs_disp_plan-mname = <fs_value2>.
              gs_disp_plan-zplan = <fs_value>.
              gs_disp_plan-zdate = ls_date.
              MODIFY zzmm_d_disp_plan FROM gs_disp_plan.
            ENDIF.
            index = index + 1.
          ENDDO.
        ENDIF.
      ENDLOOP.
  ENDCASE.
ENDFORM.

entry.title: Good afternoon Devs, I need to create an abap code that goes into the /SCMTMS/TOR>ROOT node of BOPF
entry.content:
I think the idea is to take the shipment, 
which would be the tor_id, find the root_key, 
which is that giant key (example: A13066F447681FE095EED9D5AE2B2F33), 
and then generate a row in the /SCMTMS/D_TORBLK table with the characters filled in:
BLOCK_RC = Z1 BLK_PLAN = ‚ÄòX‚Äô BLK_EXE = ‚ÄòX‚Äô

entry.title: Links are corrupted within SO10 texts
entry.content:
I have a long text in SO10 which I'm using as a "Terms and Conditions" suffix in a Smartform layout. 
The problem is that 2 web links are corrupted in a way that "https://www.testwebsite.com" looks like "mhttps://www.testwebsite.co".
Any idea how it can be resolved?

entry.title: ADT: ‚ÄúReview Proposal‚Äù dialog keeps popping up whenever Suggest keywords is enabled
entry.content:
Hi,

After updating my ADT plugins in Eclipse, I‚Äôm seeing a new behavior with code completion.
If I enable Preferences ‚Üí ABAP Development ‚Üí Editors ‚Üí Source Code Editors ‚Üí Code Completion ‚Üí Suggest keywords, a modal ‚ÄúCompletion ‚Üí Review Proposal‚Äù window pops up while I‚Äôm typing

E.g., as soon as I type sel it shows a proposal for select). This happens constantly and interrupts typing.

 

I would like to keep Suggest keywords (very helpful) but without that modal dialog.

Is anyone else facing this issue?

Thanks.

entry.title: Table maintenance alternatives in S/4HANA on premise
entry.content:
Hi,

We are working on defining best practice guidelines for creating maintenance objects in S/4HANA on promise. Depending on complexity, there seem to be a few options:

  • Using a simple Table Maintenance View from GUI with a Fiori Launchpad tile .
  • Using the Fiori app ‚ÄúCustom Business Objects‚Äù, which generates a BOPF object in the background.
  • Creating a ‚ÄòMaintenance Object‚Äô from Eclipse, which generates a RAP-based solution.

Since SAP provides the Custom Business Objects app, it could be a valid option, but RAP is the strategic direction.

I would appreciate recommendations or best practices on which approach to choose for both small/simple and more complex maintenance/configuration tables. No step-by-step instructions are needed; I am primarily looking for guidance on the preferred approach.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: (Solved) Use Case: Bulk Clone SAP Domains and Data Elements from CSV
entry.content:
Use Case: Bulk Clone SAP Domains and Data Elements from CSV with Description Retention

This ABAP program automates the cloning of multiple SAP domains and data elements by reading old and new names from a CSV file. It not only creates new objects but also copies their short text descriptions seamlessly using the SAP text management function modules READ_TEXT and SAVE_TEXT. The program supports both domains and data elements, offers file selection with F4 help, and activates newly created objects automatically. This solution significantly speeds up mass cloning tasks in SAP development, ensuring consistency and saving manual effort.

üöÄ How to Use the Bulk Clone Tool for Domains & Data Elements

‚ú® **Prepare Your CSV File** ‚ú®
- No headers, just clean comma-separated values (.csv)
- Keep it simple: use **ONE file at a time** for either **Domains** or **Data Elements** (don‚Äôt mix!)
- Format example:
* OLD_DOMAIN_NAME_1,NEW_DOMAIN_NAME_1
* OLD_DATAELEMENT_1,NEW_DATAELEMENT_1

üöÄ **Run the Program** üöÄ
- Hit **F4** to open the file browser & pick your CSV
- Check the boxes for **Domains** and/or **Data Elements** to match your file
- Press **Execute** and watch the magic happen!
- Keep an eye on the screen logs for ‚úîÔ∏è success messages or ‚ö†Ô∏è warnings

abap program -

REPORT zclone_doma_dtel_from_csv1.

TYPE-POOLS: truxs.
************************************************************************
* SELECTION SCREEN
************************************************************************
PARAMETERS: p_path TYPE rlgrap-filename OBLIGATORY,
            p_doma AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT 'X',
            p_dtel AS CHECKBOX DEFAULT 'X'.

************************************************************************
* TYPES & VARIABLES
************************************************************************
TYPES: BEGIN OF ty_mapping,
         old_name TYPE ddobjname,
         new_name TYPE ddobjname,
       END OF ty_mapping.

DATA: lt_mapping TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF ty_mapping,
      ls_mapping TYPE ty_mapping,
      lt_raw     TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF string,
      lv_line    TYPE string,
      lt_files   TYPE filetable,
      lv_rc      TYPE i,
      lv_file    TYPE string,
      lv_fname   TYPE string,
      lv_name    TYPE thead-tdname.

DATA: ls_doma        TYPE dd01v,
      ls_doma_text   TYPE dd01t,
      ls_dtel        TYPE dd04v,
      ls_dtel_text   TYPE dd04t,
      lt_texts       TYPE STANDARD TABLE OF itctc,
      ls_text        TYPE itctc.

************************************************************************
* F4 HELP FOR FILE PATH
************************************************************************
AT SELECTION-SCREEN ON VALUE-REQUEST FOR p_path.
  CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>file_open_dialog
    EXPORTING
      window_title      = 'Select CSV File'
      default_extension = 'csv'
      file_filter       = 'CSV Files (*.csv)|*.csv|All Files (*.*)|*.*'
    CHANGING
      file_table        = lt_files
      rc                = lv_rc
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS            = 1.
  IF sy-subrc = 0 AND lv_rc > 0.
    READ TABLE lt_files INTO lv_file INDEX 1.
    p_path = lv_file.
  ENDIF.

************************************************************************
* START OF SELECTION
************************************************************************
START-OF-SELECTION.

  lv_fname = p_path.

  " Upload CSV
  CALL METHOD cl_gui_frontend_services=>gui_upload
    EXPORTING
      filename = lv_fname
      filetype = 'ASC'
    CHANGING
      data_tab = lt_raw
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS   = 1.
  IF sy-subrc <> 0.
    MESSAGE 'Error uploading file' TYPE 'E'.
  ENDIF.

  " Parse CSV
  LOOP AT lt_raw INTO lv_line.
    SPLIT lv_line AT ',' INTO ls_mapping-old_name ls_mapping-new_name.
    APPEND ls_mapping TO lt_mapping.
  ENDLOOP.

************************************************************************
* COPY DOMAINS
************************************************************************
  IF p_doma = abap_true.

    LOOP AT lt_mapping INTO ls_mapping.

      CLEAR: ls_doma, ls_doma_text, lt_texts, ls_text.

      " Get original domain definition
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DOMA_GET'
        EXPORTING
          name = ls_mapping-old_name
        IMPORTING
          dd01v_wa = ls_doma
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.
      IF sy-subrc <> 0.
        WRITE: / '‚ùå Domain not found:', ls_mapping-old_name.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.

      " Change name
      ls_doma-domname = ls_mapping-new_name.

      " Put new domain
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DOMA_PUT'
        EXPORTING
          name     = ls_mapping-new_name
          dd01v_wa = ls_doma
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.
      IF sy-subrc <> 0.
        WRITE: / '‚ùå Error creating domain:', ls_mapping-new_name.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.

      " Copy long texts
      CLEAR ls_text.
      ls_text-destobject = 'DD01T'.
      ls_text-destname   = ls_mapping-new_name.
      ls_text-destid     = 'DOMA'.
      ls_text-destlang   = sy-langu.
      ls_text-srcobject  = 'DD01T'.
      ls_text-srcname    = ls_mapping-old_name.
      ls_text-srcid      = 'DOMA'.
      ls_text-srclang    = sy-langu.
      APPEND ls_text TO lt_texts.

      CALL FUNCTION 'COPY_TEXTS'
        EXPORTING
          savemode_direct = 'X'
          insert          = 'X'
        TABLES
          texts           = lt_texts
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS          = 1.

      " Copy short description (DD01T)
      SELECT SINGLE * FROM dd01t INTO ls_doma_text
       WHERE domname = ls_mapping-old_name AND ddlanguage = sy-langu.
      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        ls_doma_text-domname = ls_mapping-new_name.
        INSERT dd01t FROM ls_doma_text.
      ENDIF.

      " Activate domain
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DOMA_ACTIVATE'
        EXPORTING
          name = ls_mapping-new_name
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.

      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        WRITE: / '‚úÖ Domain created:', ls_mapping-new_name.
      ELSE.
        WRITE: / '‚ö†Ô∏è Domain activation failed:', ls_mapping-new_name.
      ENDIF.

    ENDLOOP.

  ENDIF.

************************************************************************
* COPY DATA ELEMENTS
************************************************************************
  IF p_dtel = abap_true.

    LOOP AT lt_mapping INTO ls_mapping.

      CLEAR: ls_dtel, ls_dtel_text, lt_texts, ls_text.

      " Get original data element
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DTEL_GET'
        EXPORTING
          name = ls_mapping-old_name
        IMPORTING
          dd04v_wa = ls_dtel
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.
      IF sy-subrc <> 0.
        WRITE: / '‚ùå Data element not found:', ls_mapping-old_name.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.

      " Change name
      ls_dtel-rollname = ls_mapping-new_name.

      " Put new data element
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DTEL_PUT'
        EXPORTING
          name     = ls_mapping-new_name
          dd04v_wa = ls_dtel
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.
      IF sy-subrc <> 0.
        WRITE: / '‚ùå Error creating data element:', ls_mapping-new_name.
        CONTINUE.
      ENDIF.

      " Copy long text
      CLEAR ls_text.
      ls_text-destobject = 'DD04T'.
      ls_text-destname   = ls_mapping-new_name.
      ls_text-destid     = 'DTEL'.
      ls_text-destlang   = sy-langu.
      ls_text-srcobject  = 'DD04T'.
      ls_text-srcname    = ls_mapping-old_name.
      ls_text-srcid      = 'DTEL'.
      ls_text-srclang    = sy-langu.
      APPEND ls_text TO lt_texts.

      CALL FUNCTION 'COPY_TEXTS'
        EXPORTING
          savemode_direct = 'X'
          insert          = 'X'
        TABLES
          texts           = lt_texts
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS          = 1.

      " Copy short description (DD04T)
      SELECT SINGLE * FROM dd04t INTO ls_dtel_text
       WHERE rollname = ls_mapping-old_name AND ddlanguage = sy-langu.
      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        ls_dtel_text-rollname = ls_mapping-new_name.
        INSERT dd04t FROM ls_dtel_text.
      ENDIF.

      " Activate
      CALL FUNCTION 'DDIF_DTEL_ACTIVATE'
        EXPORTING
          name = ls_mapping-new_name
        EXCEPTIONS
          OTHERS = 1.

      IF sy-subrc = 0.
        WRITE: / '‚úÖ Data element created:', ls_mapping-new_name.
      ELSE.
        WRITE: / '‚ö†Ô∏è Data element activation failed:', ls_mapping-new_name.
      ENDIF.

    ENDLOOP.
  ENDIF.

üí° Tips for Creating Large Numbers

‚úÖ Test with 5‚Äì10 entries first to ensure structure and naming is correct.

‚è≥ For large uploads, consider running it as a background job (via SM36).

entry.title: Invoice Split Issue
entry.content:
Hello, 

I am facing an issue while invoice creation, actually it should not split an invoice, but it is splitting and the reason for the split are custom fields, but we did not right any custom logic to split. VBRK-ZUKRI is same for both the invoices but still 2 invoices created.

Regards,

Ravi Seela

entry.title: Pack Handling units for multiple Inbound Delivery items
entry.content:
Hi,

Is there a way to pack Handling units in multiple Inbound Delivery items using FM/BAPI? While creating the IBD, handling units have to be created and delivery items should be packed in the corresponding handling units. External HU numbers are used. 

I have tried GN_DELIVERY_CREATE and am able to do it for a single Delivery item. ie. One or more Handling units can be packed for a single delivery item during creation of the IBD using GN_DELIVERY_CREATE. 

But I have multiple Handling units to be packed for multiple delivery items (1 to 1). Is there a way to achieve this through ABAP code?

Thanks in Advance for your replies. 

Rincy

entry.title: In ADT, how to display compiler syntax errors inline? (in addition to the view Problems)
entry.content:
One of my colleagues can see ABAP syntax errors displayed inline in Eclipse ADT as shown below:

It even simplifies the invokation of quick fix by clicking the message:

In my case these messages are only shown in the separate Problems view (so, not inline):

What is the Eclipse or ADT setting to activate this feature?

Thank you.

Sandra

entry.title: Vendor Master Customization(Implementation).
entry.content:
Hi All,

I got a requirement from Business user, They want when End user fill data manually in BP to make Vendor Code, Normal when we save they provide me Vendor Code. But their requirement is User when save SAP not provide them Vendor Code , Only allow to save the DATA. After the finance approval only after approval or When Finance approve it by Approval Button only then they get the Vendor Code automatically on the End user Mail id.

My idea  is, We can make Custom T-CODE with the help of ABAP just like BP, And custom tables to store data.

I want to know the feasibility, Idea and solution for the requirement.

Please help me here.
